articles.content: Three rounds down in 2024 and ahead of Round 4 in Imola, Formula 2 returns to the track for three days of in-season testing. Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya hosts what many expect to be a pivotal run … [+4107 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Mitchell Starc praised in KKR dressing room after close win against RCB - cricxtasy.com
articles.description: Despite his high economy of 18.3, Starc was hailed in the Kolkata Knight Riders dressing room after the match against RCB.
articles.content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru recently registered a narrow loss against Kolkata Knight Riders on April 22 at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata. After a close single run win, Kolkata Knight Riders now stands … [+2377 chars]

articles.author: The Quint
articles.title: Women's Candidates Tournament: Koneru Humpy Claims Runner-Up Spot, Vaishali 4th - The Quint
articles.description: Indian grandmaster Koneru Humpy came through when it counted most, beating Tingjie Lei of China to secure second place in the women's candidates tournament in Toronto.
articles.content:
In the women's section of the 2024 Candidates Tournament in Toronto, Indian grandmaster Koneru Humpy came second while R Vaishali finished fourth after winning five games in a row.
37-year-old Humpy… [+208 chars]
